name: advanca-voting-dapp
author: preston4896@me.com
description: A simple decentralized web application where users can create or vote proposals by staking ETH tokens.

scripts.compile: npx babel ./src/js/jsx/app.jsx --preset react-app/prod > ./src/js/app.js && echo JSX compiled successfully.
scripts.build: npx terser -c -m -o ./src/js/app.min.js ./src/js/app.js && echo App is production-ready!
